He was in middle school, then 2 years later he's probably 14ish?  For animu sake, a lot taller and more adult-like.

For people confused about the kid's appearance on the last page; it's probably a High School uniform.  My guess is he got his parents to let him apply to a high school in the city so that he can live with her.

body: How tf it's only 2 years
Good ending, just wish I could read it

How did she not get pregnant and also shota evolved into normie guy wow
sooo cute, extra chapter please.
Bro took the captain America treatment. Liked the series though, wish it was longer

What tha... that ending, why is she crying? It's not like they were long lost or something and shota showed up with a tux suit and stuff in a short span of 2 years like as if he's way grown up? Just give MC a decent shirt with a collar would be enough already haha what tha. I had no problems all chapters until the last page, I mean I get it that she finally get to be with him but wtf with the suit and then with her crying (it's like her personality of a gyaru has completely washed off, which is what she had during 99% of the time in the entire story) out of happiness and love right? I guess author wanted to show a soft side of her. Nevertheless, the series was pretty sweet, great art, and don't care about shota nor tiny penis and a happy ending. Only thing left are the translations. Overall: satisfied.
really this is how you ended ? not even showing how that shota look like now as a teenager ? that's a dick move author dick move
